Package com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs

Class MessageEnvelope<T extends Message>

java.lang.Object
com.hedera.hashgraph.identity.hcs.MessageEnvelope<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class MessageEnvelope<T extends Message>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
The envelope for Hedera identity messages sent to HCS DID or VC topics.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • MessageEnvelope

      public MessageEnvelope​(T message)
      Creates a new message envelope for the given message.
      Parameters:
      message - The message.

  • Method Details

    • fromMirrorResponse

      public static <U extends Message> MessageEnvelope<U> fromMirrorResponse​(com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.TopicMessage response, java.lang.Class<U> messageClass)
      Converts a message from a DID or VC topic response into object instance.
      Type Parameters:
      U - Type of the message inside envelope.
      Parameters:
      response - Topic message as a response from mirror node.
      messageClass - Class type of the message inside envelope.
      Returns:
      The MessageEnvelope.

    • fromJson

      public static <U extends Message> MessageEnvelope<U> fromJson​(java.lang.String json, java.lang.Class<U> messageClass)
      Converts a VC topic message from a JSON string into object instance.
      Type Parameters:
      U - Type of the message inside envelope.
      Parameters:
      json - VC topic message as JSON string.
      messageClass - Class of the message inside envelope.
      Returns:
      The MessageEnvelope.

    • sign

      public byte[] sign​(java.util.function.UnaryOperator<byte[]> signer)
      Signs this message envelope with the given signing function.
      Parameters:
      signer - The signing function.
      Returns:
      This envelope signed and serialized to JSON, ready for submission to HCS topic.

    • toJson

      public java.lang.String toJson()
      Converts this message envelope into a JSON string.
      Returns:
      The JSON string representing this message envelope.

    • encrypt

      public MessageEnvelope<T> encrypt​(java.util.function.UnaryOperator<T> encrypter)
      Encrypts the message in this envelope and returns its encrypted instance.
      Parameters:
      encrypter - The function used to encrypt the message.
      Returns:
      This envelope instance.

    • isSignatureValid

      public boolean isSignatureValid​(java.util.function.Function<MessageEnvelope<T>,​com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.PublicKey> publicKeyProvider)
      Verifies the signature of the envelope against the public key of it's signer.
      Parameters:
      publicKeyProvider - Provider of a public key of this envelope signer.
      Returns:
      True if the message is valid, false otherwise.

    • open

      public T open()
      Opens a plain message in this envelope. If the message is encrypted, this will throw IllegalArgumentException.
      Returns:
      The message object in a plain mode.

    • open

      public T open​(java8.util.function.BiFunction<T,​org.threeten.bp.Instant,​T> decrypter)
      Opens a message in this envelope. If the message is encrypted, the given decrypter will be used first to decrypt it. If the message is not encrypted, it will be immediately returned.
      Parameters:
      decrypter - The function used to decrypt the message.
      Returns:
      The message object in a plain mode.

      public java.lang.String getSignature()
